info: Athletes may have Resting Heart Rates as low as 40-60 bpm due to their conditioning
Maximum Heart Rate (for calculation): 220 minus your age (MHR = 220 - age)
Target Heart Rate (during exercise): Generally 50-85% of your maximum heart rate, depending on fitness goals.

systolic_pressure.def: The pressure in your arteries when your heart beats.
info: Hypertension Stage 2: 140 mm Hg or higher

diastolic_pressure.def: The pressure in your arteries when your heart is at rest between beats.
info: Hypertension Stage 2: 100 mm Hg or higher
Low-Density Lipoprotein (LDL) Cholesterol (bad cholesterol): Optimal: Less than 100 mg/dL
